column4: Description

Location Data Management: CR Location Directory Entry Instance Record
CR Location Directory Entry Instance Record
column4: Reference to associated location (can be a physical or electronic location)

Location Data Management: CR Location Directory Entry Instance Record
column4: Key dates associated with the directory entry (e.g. open date, refresh date)

Location Data Management: CR Location Directory Entry Instance Record
column4: Value of the date type
Reference to the bank customer (if they are owner and/or occupier of the property at the location)
Registered owner or title holder(s) of the property
The estimated (book) value of the property at the location - rental and purchase as appropriate
The type of occupancy (e.g. residency, business, retail, entertainment)
Known contact reference details of occupier (e.g. family name, company, retailer)
Nature of the access terms or entitlement of the occupier (e.g. leasehold, rental, public access)
Reference to a bank alliance partner with some kind of link association to the location (used for location based marketing)
Type of location (e.g. building, point of interest, virtual location/device)
Reference address for the location (e.g. postal address, email, coordinates)
The coordinates in a form that can be used to match tracked parties to the location (e.g. for real-time marketing)
A description of the property, particularly if it has landmark characteristics
The construction approach for a property at the location (e.g. era and architecture as might be used in valuation)
An indication of the size or scale of the property where appropriate (e.g. 4 bedroom, 600 seat auditorium, 40 cover restaurant)
The tracked status (e.g. under construction or repair, inhabited, vacant)
The general purpose and neighborhood of the property  (e.g. residential, industrial, commercial)
The planning or zoning status (e.g. residential, commercial, industrial)
The allowed usage for the property at the location (e.g. domestic residence, manufacturing, retail)
